questions.question: What email address should be used for admin access?
questions.answer: Will use database role column instead of hardcoded email. Admin role will be assigned via CLI.

questions.question: Should we use a hardcoded email check or add a role/is_admin column to the database?
questions.answer: Database role column - add is_admin to profiles table

questions.question: What chart library preference do you have? (recharts is popular and lightweight)
